2850/A0/05/883/001.status_value: The results of the ENADID 2014 were released  and questions of breastfeeding and birth registration proposed by UNICEF were added.  In the Inter-census Survey  questions on school attendance   dropout and time invested in going to school  as well as self-identification as indigenous  proposed by UNICEF  were also included.

2850/A0/05/883/001.headline: In 2016 UNICEF contributed to the creation of a national information system on children as defined by the General Law on Child and Adolescent Rights and to the elaboration of federal and subnational programmes for the protection of child rights.
2850/A0/05/883/001.baseline_value: Información disponible actualmente en: ENSANUT 2012  ENOE-MTI  CENSO 2010 y ENEIVEMS.

2850/A0/05/882/003.status_value: Constitutional Reform to pave the way for new National Law in 2015  passed in Senate  and awaiting approval in the Chamber of Deputies. Gaceta Parlamentaria del Senado 21/10/2014
2850/A0/05/882/003.indicator_name: Una Ley General de Justicia para Adolescentes aprobada por el Congreso de la Unión  que homologue los criterios normativos que rigen los sistemas de justicia especializada para adolescentes en los estados  en sintonía con los estándares internacionales.
2850/A0/05/882/003.headline: The approval of the National Juvenile Justice Law was the highlight of UNICEF's efforts on juvenile justice. UNICEF played a critical role in terms of technical assistance and advocacy for its approval. UNICEF and partners have strengthened a non-custodial sentencing pilot and have systematized the experience for its replication.
2850/A0/05/882/003.baseline_value: En 2013  32 leyes estatales de justicia especializada para adolescentes y 1 ley federal que no cuentan con criterios homologados.

2850/A0/05/882/002.indicator_name: SOP for case management  including migrant and refugee children developed and disseminated.
2850/A0/05/882/002.headline: Government capacity for special protection was strengthened through the establishment and operation of 30 state-level Child Protection Authorities and training of more than 3 000 staff dealing with child protection. Alternative care and de-institutionalization have been placed on the political agenda and pilot foster programmes have been initiated in three sites.

2850/A0/05/882/002.status_value: Una procuraduría federal creada y funcionando en 2015 y 30 procuradurías estatales creadas y funcionando en 2016. Lineamientos de funcionamiento aprobados y publicados.
2850/A0/05/882/002.indicator_name: Exsitencia de Procuraduria Federal de Proteccion y No. de procuradurias estatales con lineamientos de operacion.

2850/A0/05/882/002.status_value: Common procedure for child protection at all levels of the federation provided for in December 2014 Child Rights Law  to be established from 2015. (DOF  4/12/2014)
2850/A0/05/882/002.indicator_name: A finales de 2018 existe un modelo nacional uniforme de protección especial que es retomado y aplicado a nivel estatal.

2850/A0/05/884/003.status_value: Se esperan los lineamientos que emitirá el INEE en relación con la educación indígena para incidir en la revisión de la propuesta programática de educación indígena. Se prepara un diplomado en educación indígena  con sede en Chihuahua y se tienen previstas capacitaciones de mediano y largo plazo en otras entidades.  Se iniciaron reuniones con la CGEIB para realizar una estrategia de intervención que fortalezca capacidades de docentes y supervisores para atender NNA indígenas en contextos urbanos

Capacity-building activities reached 1 000 teachers in areas such as intercultural practices  participation and gender sensitivity.

2850/A0/05/884/002.status_value: Se ha concluido la revisión del Mapeo de servicios de DIT. Se ha enviado a impresión la versión resumida del estudio y la versión completa se ha enviado a diseño. A partir de la presentación se han promovido instancias de coordinación intersectorial a nivel estatal en Oaxaca y en Quintana Roo para la conformación de bases de datos conjuntas y análisis de prioridades en la atención a niños y niñas en la primera infancia.

2850/A0/05/884/004.indicator_name: "Policy for home visits of new borns is developed and/or revised  adopted and in use"
2850/A0/05/884/004.headline: The coordinated work between all areas of UNICEF Mexico contributed to results in maternal and neonatal health  breastfeeding and the promotion of healthy and nutritional habits in México. In that sense  UNICEF contributed to raise exclusive breastfeeding from 14.4% in 2012 to 30.4% in 2015 nationally.

2850/A0/05/884/004.status_value: Some components have been incorporated into legislation but not all.

2850/A0/05/886/002.indicator_name: Tasa de éxito en la búsqueda de nuevos aliados
2850/A0/05/886/002.headline: Significant progress in line with UNICEF Mexico PSFR Strategic Plan 2014-2018. Fundraising growth accelerated significantly as we fundraised MXN 57 121 325 over the Jan-Jun'17 period which represents a 25% increase compared to the same period in 2016 (MXN 45 842 841)  on track at 46% to reach 2017 income objective of MXN $125 260 940.
